About Us

UNITE . RISE . EMPOWER

We the members of Rotaract Bangalore East (Easterners) shall follow the moto of "Unite to Rise and Empower"

Joining Hands with our Community

We cheer the joy of helping the community around us. Along with helping each other grow to be a better leaders.

Why choose us ?

Rotaract Bangalore East believes in "Unity to Rise and Empower", Join us to experience the joy of giving as part of family of RBE

What is a Rotaract Club?

Rotaract clubs bring together people ages 18-30 to exchange ideas with leaders in the community, develop leadership and professional skills, and have fun through service.

Why should I join Rotaract?

Rotaract is global movement of young leaders who are developing innovative solutions to the worldâ€™s most pressing challenges.
In communities worldwide, Rotary and Rotaract members work side by side to take action through service. From big cities to rural villages, Rotaract is changing communities like yours.

How do I know more about Rotaract?

Visit https://www.rotary.org/en/get-involved/rotaract-clubs.

Join Rotaract Bangalore East

To UNITE with EASTERNERS to RISE and EMPOWER
